statements: SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating > 4;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_rating ASC, vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating > 4 ORDER BY vendor_name ASC
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_rating DESC
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email, vendor_rating FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating < 3 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name ILIKE 'A%' AND vendor_email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 4 ORDER BY vendor_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM Vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, join_date FROM Vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, join_date FROM Vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, join_date FROM Vendors ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, join_date FROM Vendors WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Vendors
SELECT vendor_name, join_date FROM Vendors ORDER BY join_date DESC
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, sales_volume FROM Vendors INNER JOIN VendorPerformance ON Vendors.vendor_id = VendorPerformance.vendor_id
SELECT vendor_name, sales_volume, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM Vendors INNER JOIN VendorPerformance ON Vendors.vendor_id = VendorPerformance.vendor_id WHERE sales_volume > 1000
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(sales_volume) AS average_sales FROM Vendors INNER JOIN VendorPerformance ON Vendors.vendor_id = VendorPerformance.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING average_sales > 500
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM vendors JOIN reviews ON vendors.vendor_id = reviews.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, review_text, rating FROM vendors JOIN reviews ON vendors.vendor_id = reviews.vendor_id ORDER BY rating DESC, review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM vendors JOIN orders ON vendors.vendor_id = orders.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM vendors INNER JOIN reviews ON vendors.vendor_id = reviews.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT vendor_name, order_date, total_amount FROM vendors LEFT JOIN orders ON vendors.vendor_id = orders.vendor_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors WHERE vendor_rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY vendor_rating DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_rating FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 50
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, order_details.product_id, order_details.quantity FROM orders INNER JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT rating_id, rating, comment FROM ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT rating, comment FROM ratings WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount < 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
